intent_atoms.description: Recognize senc, saio, and saiz boxes during fragment parsing so the pipeline records their offsets/sizes and surfaces presence to CLI/UI consumers without attempting decryption.
Child boxes cannot exceed parent ranges and overlapping payloads are flagged for CLI/UI surfaces.
CLI preset selection, alias flags, metadata propagation, and coverage notes wired into the validation pipeline.
CLI, JSON, and session state exports include the active preset identifier plus any disabled rule IDs.
Real‑world assets licensing must be secured before synthetic payloads can be replaced and regression baselines refreshed.

functional_units.name: Sample Encryption Placeholder Parsing
functional_units.description: Recognizes senc, saio, and saiz boxes during fragment parsing, records their offsets/sizes, and surfaces presence to CLI/UI without attempting decryption.

functional_units.name: Enforce Parent Containment and Non-Overlap Validation
functional_units.description: Validates that child boxes do not exceed parent ranges and flags overlapping payloads for CLI/UI surfaces.

functional_units.name: Validation Preset CLI Wiring
functional_units.description: Provides CLI preset selection, alias flags, metadata propagation, and coverage notes for validation presets.

functional_units.name: Export Metadata Enhancements
functional_units.description: Extends CLI, JSON, and session state exports to include active preset identifier and any disabled rule IDs.

functional_units.name: Real-World Asset Licensing
functional_units.description: Secures licensing for Dolby Vision, AV1, VP9, Dolby AC-4, and MPEG-H fixtures to replace synthetic payloads and refresh regression baselines.

functional_units.name: Codec Validation Coverage Expansion
functional_units.description: Expands validation coverage across additional codecs as documented in the integration coverage summary.
